response:
Young adult with optic neuritis plus partial myelopathy (dissemination in space) strongly suggests central inflammatory demyelination; alternatives considered based on optic–spinal syndromes and cord compression/infiltration mimics.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing\u2013remitting multiple sclerosis", "Neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder (AQP4-IgG positive)", "MOG antibody\u2013associated disease", "Compressive thoracic myelopathy (e.g., meningioma)", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Autoimmune myelitis secondary to SLE/Sj\u00f6gren", "Vitamin B12 deficiency (subacute combined degeneration)", "Syphilis-related myelitis/optic neuropathy", "HTLV-1\u2013associated myelopathy"]
